check.villainousdifficultymultipliers.bl: When you take damage, your ability to heal is nullified until you hit a monster or a player with a melee attack. Punch 'em in the chin!
check.villainousdifficultymultipliers.ca: Bombs away! Creepers always explode on death, regardless of method.
check.villainousdifficultymultipliers.ve: Cave spiders inflict poison for a brief moment on easy, and both wither and poison on normal and hard. Spiders also get the ability to poison you for a shorter amount of time.
check.villainousdifficultymultipliers.sh: Fighting the same zombies gets old. Zombies are converted to drowned, husks, or zombie villagers instantly, skeletons are converted to strays instantly, and creepers are always supercharged.
check.villainousdifficultymultipliers.ka: There is a 1 in 20 chance any animal usually farmed for food will explode violently when a player hits them. Tread Lightly.
check.villainousdifficultymultipliers.ag: We all get old at some point. Upon breeding 4 times, animals and villagers will die of old age.
check.villainousdifficultymultipliers.so: Your particularly soft skin makes you more vulnerable to damage. All incoming damage has an extra 50% added to it.
check.villainousdifficultymultipliers.fa: Phantoms are a lame punishment for lack of sleep. Enjoy debuffs and eventual death by lack of sleep with this modifier!
check.villainousdifficultymultipliers.he: All difficulty increasing multipliers are enabled or disabled at once.
check.villainousdifficultymultipliers.ha: All hostile mobs have increased health
check.villainousdifficultymultipliers.an: Pillagers, Skeletons, Strays, and Witches all have significantly sped up attack rates.
check.villainousdifficultymultipliers.ki: Future technology embedded into your skin allows you to store up kinetic energy from attacks to release on your foes on your next attack, adding up to 50 hearts of damage maximum.
check.villainousdifficultymultipliers.un: Creeper explosions and Ghast fireballs have a larger explosion radius. For all your mass terrain destruction needs.
When you are about to die, you're instantly brought back to full health. Allows you to get back into the fight immediately, but does still increase your death counters.
check.villainousdifficultymultipliers.fl: Entities on fire will stay on fire until water is applied (or they have died)
check.villainousdifficultymultipliers.bl: Stronger understanding of proper anvil usage makes you less likely to damage it.
check.villainousdifficultymultipliers.fu: Modern furnaces can get 4 times the use out of fuel.
check.villainousdifficultymultipliers.wa: Tools may be replaced when they are destroyed.
check.villainousdifficultymultipliers.ve: Eating meat makes you feel sick to your stomach. Whether or not it's for moral reasons, health reasons, or anything in between.
check.villainousdifficultymultipliers.wr: That's just... Wrong - Some neutral mobs may have more aggression towards you.
error.villainousdifficultymultipliers.li: Run /vdm list for a list of available multipliers!
help.villainousdifficultymultipliers.hel: * /vdm help - shows a list of difficulty multiplier commands
help.villainousdifficultymultipliers.act: * /vdm activate <difficulty multiplier> - Activates a difficulty multiplier
help.villainousdifficultymultipliers.dea: * /vdm deactivate <difficulty multiplier> - Deactivates a difficulty multiplier
help.villainousdifficultymultipliers.act: * /vdm activelist - shows the list of currently active difficulty multipliers
help.villainousdifficultymultipliers.lis: * /vdm list - shows the list of all difficulty multipliers
help.villainousdifficultymultipliers.che: * /vdm check <difficulty multiplier> - Describes which each multiplier does.
info.villainousdifficultymultipliers.her: or Heroic, which controls all difficulty increasing multipliers
info.villainousdifficultymultipliers.key: or KeystotheCity, which controls all difficulty decreasing multipliers
death.attack.fatigue: %1$s forgot how important sleep is and died because of it.
activation.villainousdifficultymultiplie: All difficulty increasing multipliers activated! Good luck.
deactivation.villainousdifficultymultipl: All difficulty increasing multipliers deactivated! Rest easy.
All difficulty decreasing multipliers deactivated. Welcome back.
activation.villainousdifficultymultiplie: All difficulty decreasing multipliers activated. Have fun.
check.villainousdifficultymultipliers.ke: All difficulty decreasing multipliers are enabled or disabled at once.
status.villainousdifficultymultipliers.v: You feel sick to your stomach...
